pr_title: fix: Properly define + document JKubeProjectAssembly behavior

timeline.message:
WIP: TODO, fix documentation, check rest of examples

Signed-off-by: Marc Nuri <marc@marcnuri.com>

fix: Properly define + document JKubeProjectAssembly behavior

- AssemblyFileSet supports wildcard includes and excludes
- AssemblyFileSet contains default file and directory modes
- Removed no longer working descriptor and descriptorRef configs from AssemblyFileSet
- Removed unsupported assembly .xml descriptors
- Removed outdated documentation
- xml-config quickstart works as expected
- Fixed *Controller*Enricher to support xml configured names (just like replicas or image pull policy)
- Updated Assembly related documentation
- Updated ibm-javaee8-webprofile-liberty example

Signed-off-by: Marc Nuri <marc@marcnuri.com>
